data.eml:eml: Hisonotusacuen, a new and phenotypically variable cascudinho (Siluriformes, Loricariidae, Hypoptopomatinae) from the upper rio Xingu basin, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silva, Gabriel S. C., Roxo, Fabio F., Oliveira, Claudio (2014): Hisonotusacuen, a new and phenotypically variable cascudinho (Siluriformes, Loricariidae, Hypoptopomatinae) from the upper rio Xingu basin, Brazil. ZooKeys 442: 105-125, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.442.7870, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.442.7870
